name: ASHISH CHAUHDARY
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: AI-Powered Image Generation
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly AI image generator web application that empowers users to create unique images from text prompts. Integrated Gemini API for seamless AI model interactions, achieving a 95% user satisfaction rate based on post-use surveys. Optimized the application for performance, reducing average image generation time by 30% and enabling real-time image-sharing functionality, which was utilized by 70% of users.

projects.name: Recipes Explorer
projects.description: Engineered a mobile-friendly interface based on responsive design methodologies; successfully increased mobile user engagement by 50% and improved overall application performance on various devices. Integrated an external recipe API, enabling users to search over 100+ recipes with real-time filtering based on ingredients, cuisine, and dietary preferences.

experiences.description: Developed and maintained various features for assign task, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement. Collaborated with the design and backend teams to implement responsive web designs that improved user experience. Worked with version control systems, such as Git, GitHub to manage code versions.
